meanings.sent1: Last night, I sleepwalked around the house without even realizing it.
meanings.sent2: She often sleepwalked when she was stressed out.
meanings.sent3: The sleepwalking cat accidentally knocked over a vase in the dark.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was so consumed with worry that she sleepwalked through her daily routine.
meanings.sent5: The ghostly figure sleepwalked through the haunted mansion, unaware of its surroundings.
